How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

The ideal solution would be a ServiceNow app where users can submit requests for medical aid (e.g., appointments, medication, transportation). The system would automatically assign requests to the right department or volunteer, send status updates, and generate dashboards for administrators to monitor trends and resource usage. Integration with notifications (email/SMS) would keep users informed and reduce missed appointments.
